vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to throw down, thrust down, thrust out, thrust away
1a) (Niphal) to be thrust down, be thrust away, be thrown down, be cast aside
vocabInfos._es_Definition: nif.   ser arrojado de cabeza, caer, perecer
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 扔掉, 推下, 推出
1a) (Niphal) 被推下, 被推走, 被扔掉, 被拋棄
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 扔掉, 推下, 推出
1a) (Niphal) 被推下, 被推走, 被扔掉, 被抛弃
